item.title: Hong Kong Denies Visa Renewal for Senior Bloomberg Journalist
item.description: The unexplained decision raises new concerns about the erosion of press freedom in a city transformed by Beijing’s national security law.

item.title: As Other Israelis Die in War, Ultra-Orthodox Resist Call to Fight

item.title: Revealing Taste
item.description: A clever leak exposed the music habits of some famous people — and two Times journalists.
